accordion_sections.title: Care Instructions
accordion_sections.content:
Keep Your Dress Looking Perfect

üß∫

Dry Clean Only - Professional care recommended

‚ú® Cleaning & Maintenance
  • Professional dry cleaning only - Sequins require gentle, specialized care
  • Spot clean minor stains immediately with cool water and gentle blotting
  • Never machine wash or hand wash - this will damage the sequins
  • Allow dress to air out after wearing before storing
üëó Storage Tips
  • Hang on padded hanger to maintain shape
  • Store in breathable garment bag (included)
  • Keep away from direct sunlight to prevent color fading
  • Avoid plastic bags - sequin fabric needs to breathe
  • Store in cool, dry place away from humidity
üí° Wearing & Handling
  • Be gentle when putting on - sequins can snag on jewelry
  • Avoid rough surfaces that could catch sequins
  • Apply perfume, lotion, and makeup before putting on dress
  • Check for loose sequins before wearing - secure with clear thread if needed
  • Steam wrinkles from inside (never iron directly on sequins)
üåü Long-Term Care
  • Professional cleaning after 3-4 wears (or as needed)
  • Inspect sequins periodically - minor repairs prevent larger issues
  • Refresh between wears with fabric refresher spray (at 12" distance)
  • Consider professional sequin repair for any damage

‚ö†Ô∏è

Important: Never use bleach, harsh detergents, or fabric softener. These will permanently damage the sequins and fabric.

Pro Tip from Our Stylists

Keep a small sewing kit handy for quick sequin touch-ups. A few loose sequins are normal with wear - simply secure with matching thread to prevent further loss.
